name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A scroll of names of people who contributed bento boxes to the event.
Transition screens showing the event logo and social media guidelines.
A scroll of names of people who contributed flowers (Prasta) to the event.
Continuation of donor scrolls and transition screens accompanied by an upbeat song medley.
scenes.song_name: Step and Go!! / Kotobuki!! Kyung Kyung Kyung

scenes.description: A more emotional song plays while the donor lists for bento and flowers continue to cycle through.

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: To everyone who sent a gift, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ...んなくなる
subtitles.english: ...will disappear

subtitles.original: 夢も愛も ギュッとして いっぱいだから
subtitles.english: I've packed my dreams and love so tight,

subtitles.original: 持ちきれない
subtitles.english: That I can't hold them all anymore.

subtitles.original: でも欲張りすぎて きっと 落ちていく
subtitles.english: But I'm being too greedy, so I'm sure I'll fall down.

subtitles.original: もうラカラカチュチュ 恋に落ちちゃって
subtitles.english: Now, laka-laka chu-chu, I've fallen in love,

subtitles.original: ギュッギュッもう戻れない
subtitles.english: Tightly, tightly, I can't go back now.

subtitles.original: あれあれなんで ふわっと心が まだ熱くなるの
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, why is my heart still feeling so light and warm?

subtitles.original: ラカラカチュチュ 君の重力で
subtitles.english: Laka-laka chu-chu, with your gravity,

subtitles.original: ギュッギュッ引き寄せて
subtitles.english: Tightly, tightly, pulling me in.

subtitles.original: カレイドスコープ 覗いてるみたいで ねえキラキラな
subtitles.english: It's like looking through a kaleidoscope, hey, it's so sparkly.

subtitles.original: 未来 見たい 分からない
subtitles.english: I want to see the future, but I don't know it yet.

subtitles.original: Ah Up and Down で 振り回す
subtitles.english: Ah, tossing and turning with up and down,

subtitles.original: Yo & Day 今日は 四六時中
subtitles.english: Yo & Day, today, all day long,

subtitles.original: カレンダー 30日でも 足りない
subtitles.english: Even 30 days on a calendar aren't enough.

subtitles.original: あれもこれもそれも 全部したい
subtitles.english: I want to do this, that, and everything!

subtitles.original: キュンキュンキュン上昇 ドキドキ白昼夢
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun rising, a heart-pounding daydream,

subtitles.original: キュンキュンキュン降下 深呼吸
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun falling, take a deep breath.

subtitles.original: キュンキュンキュン上昇 ラブリーメンタル
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun rising, lovely mental state,

subtitles.original: キュンキュンキュン降下 手を繋ごう
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun falling, let's hold hands.

subtitles.original: 無限大の愛だけど
subtitles.english: It's an infinite love,

subtitles.original: 失敗だけど 諦めない
subtitles.english: Even if I fail, I won't give up.

subtitles.original: まだ欲張りだから 君と
subtitles.english: Because I'm still greedy, with you,

subtitles.original: 落ちていく
subtitles.english: I'm falling down.

subtitles.original: もうラカラカチュチュ 心がはまって
subtitles.english: Now, laka-laka chu-chu, my heart is stuck,

subtitles.original: ギュッギュッ抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Tightly, tightly, I can't escape.

subtitles.original: あれあれなんで 目まぐるしい心が まだ熱くなるの
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, why is my dizzy heart still feeling so warm?

subtitles.original: ラカラカチュチュ スピード重視で
subtitles.english: Laka-laka chu-chu, prioritizing speed,

subtitles.original: ギュッギュッ引き寄せて
subtitles.english: Tightly, tightly, pulling me in.

subtitles.original: カレイドスコープ 覗いてるみたいで ねえキラキラな
subtitles.english: It's like looking through a kaleidoscope, hey, it's so sparkly.

subtitles.original: 未来 見たい 分からない
subtitles.english: I want to see the future, but I don't know it yet.

subtitles.original: ちっぽけだな 理想とか
subtitles.english: Ideals are such small things,

subtitles.original: 私はまだ 未完成で
subtitles.english: I am still incomplete.

subtitles.original: あの空に 目を細めてしまうんだ
subtitles.english: I find myself squinting at that sky.

subtitles.original: 考えても どうしようもないことだと
subtitles.english: Even if I think about it, it's something I can't help.

subtitles.original: 止めな 心から 色々込み上げてくるけど
subtitles.english: Stop it, all sorts of things are welling up from my heart, but...

subtitles.original: だからこそ 笑顔でね
subtitles.english: That's why, with a smile,

subtitles.original: だからこそ 負けないで
subtitles.english: That's why, don't give up.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたくための 羽を手にして 飛び立っていくんだよ
subtitles.english: Take hold of the wings to fly and take flight.

subtitles.original: 空を飛んでいこう 飛んでいこう 色づいていく夢 ほら虹空
subtitles.english: Let's fly through the sky, fly, dreams gaining color, look, a rainbow sky.

subtitles.original: 青を待ってみよう 待ってみよう 少し大きくなったね
subtitles.english: Let's wait for the blue, wait, you've grown a little bigger, haven't you?

subtitles.original: 空は青い色 青い色 少し経ったら すぐに茜色
subtitles.english: The sky is blue, blue, and after a little while, it's immediately madder red.

subtitles.original: ちょっと迷っても 迷っても ゆっくり風を受けて
subtitles.english: Even if you're a little lost, lost, just slowly catch the wind.

subtitles.original: 空に願いを
subtitles.english: A wish to the sky,

subtitles.original: 何遍も言うよ 口ずさんで
subtitles.english: I'll say it over and over, humming along.

subtitles.original: いつしか 忘れていた 奇跡の 閉じ方を探そう
subtitles.english: Let's find the way to close the miracles we'd forgotten at some point.

subtitles.original: ある時は 笑顔でね
subtitles.english: Sometimes with a smile,

subtitles.original: ある時は 泣き顔で
subtitles.english: Sometimes with a crying face.

subtitles.original: 見上げたあの空 目印にして 羽ばたいていくんだよ
subtitles.english: Using that sky we looked up at as a landmark, we'll take flight.
